freeports_analysis.constsÔÉÅ

Provide basic constant and types used by all submodules, should facilitate avoiding circular imports

class freeports_analysis.consts.Bond(page: int, targets: List[str], company: str, subfund: str, nominal_quantity: int, market_value: float, currency: Currency, perc_net_assets: float, acquisition_cost: float = None, maturity: date = None, interest_rate: float = None)ÔÉÅ

Concrete class representing bond financial instruments.

Extends FinancialData with bond-specific attributes including maturity date and interest rate.

maturityÔÉÅ

The maturity date of the bond.

Type:

datetime.date, optional

interest_rateÔÉÅ

The interest rate of the bond (should be between 0 and 1).

Type:

float, optional

property instrument: FinancialInstrumentÔÉÅ

Identifies this instrument as BOND type.

Ritorna:

Always returns FinancialInstrument.BOND

Tipo di ritorno:

FinancialInstrument

Type:

FinancialInstrument

property interest_rate: floatÔÉÅ

The interest rate of the bond.

Ritorna:

The interest rate value

Tipo di ritorno:

float

Note

Logs a warning if interest rate is not normalized (0-1 range).

Type:

float or None

exception freeports_analysis.consts.CircularPromisesChainÔÉÅ

Exception raised when a circular dependency is detected in promise resolution. This occurs when a promise chain references itself either directly or indirectly, creating an infinite loop that cannot be resolved.

class freeports_analysis.consts.Equity(page: int, targets: List[str], company: str | CompanyPromise, subfund: str | SubfundPromise, nominal_quantity: int | NominalQuantityPromise, market_value: float | MarkedValuePromise, currency: Currency | CurrencyPromise, perc_net_assets: float | PercNetAssetsPromise, acquisition_cost: float | AcquisitionCostPromise = None)ÔÉÅ

Concrete class representing equity financial instruments.

Inherits from FinancialData and implements the instrument property to identify as EQUITY type.

class freeports_analysis.consts.FinancialData(page: int, targets: List[str], company: str | CompanyPromise, subfund: str | SubfundPromise, nominal_quantity: int | NominalQuantityPromise, market_value: float | MarkedValuePromise, currency: Currency | CurrencyPromise, perc_net_assets: float | PercNetAssetsPromise, acquisition_cost: float | AcquisitionCostPromise = None)ÔÉÅ

Abstract base class representing financial data.

This class serves as the foundation for specific financial instrument types, providing common attributes and validation.

pageÔÉÅ

The page number where the financial data appears (must be positive).

Type:

int

targetsÔÉÅ

The list of companies to search for, used as company validation

Type:

List[str]

companyÔÉÅ

The name of the company or issuer.

Type:

str | CompanyPromise

market_valueÔÉÅ

The current market value of the instrument.

Type:

float | MarketValuePromise

currencyÔÉÅ

The currency in which the value is denominated.

Type:

Currency | CurrencyPromise

perc_net_assetsÔÉÅ

Percentage of net assets (must be between 0 and 1).

Type:

float | PercNetAssetsPromise

subfundÔÉÅ

The subfund to which this instrument belongs.

Type:

str | SubfundPromise

nominal_quantityÔÉÅ

The nominal quantity of the instrument, if applicable.

Type:

int | NominalQuantityPromise , optional

acquisition_costÔÉÅ

The original acquisition cost of the instrument.

Type:

float | AcquisitionCostPromise , optional

Solleva:

ValueError ‚Äì If perc_net_assets is not between 0 and 1. If page is not a positive number. If company is not in targets. If company is not in targets.

property acquisition_cost: floatÔÉÅ

The original acquisition cost of the instrument.

Type:

float or None

property company: strÔÉÅ

The name of the company or issuer.

Type:

str

property currency: CurrencyÔÉÅ

The currency in which the value is denominated.

Type:

Currency

fulfill_promises(mapping: dict, targets: List[str]) → NoneÔÉÅ

Resolve all promise objects in this financial data instance.

Processes each attribute that may contain a Promise object, resolving it using the provided mapping and performing validation where required.

Parametri:

  • mapping (PromisesResolutionMap) ‚Äì Dictionary containing values to resolve promises from.

  • targets (List[str]) ‚Äì List of valid company names for validation.

Note

For attributes that require validation (perc_net_assets, company), the resolved values will be validated before assignment.

abstract property instrument: FinancialInstrumentÔÉÅ

Abstract property to identify the financial instrument type. :returns: The type of financial instrument (EQUITY, BOND, etc.) :rtype: FinancialInstrument

property market_value: floatÔÉÅ

The current market value of the instrument.

Type:

float

property nominal_quantity: intÔÉÅ

The nominal quantity of the instrument, if applicable.

Type:

int or None

property page: intÔÉÅ

The page number where the financial data appears.

Type:

int

property perc_net_assets: floatÔÉÅ

Percentage of net assets (between 0 and 1).

Type:

float

property subfund: strÔÉÅ

The subfund to which this instrument belongs.

Type:

str

class freeports_analysis.consts.Promise(ID: str)ÔÉÅ

Base class for deferred value resolution in financial data processing. Implements a promise pattern where values can be resolved later from a mapping. .. attribute:: id

The key used to lookup the promised value in the resolution mapping.

type:

str

fulfill_with(mapping: PromisesResolutionMap) → AnyÔÉÅ

Resolves the promised value from the given mapping.

fulfill_with(mapping: dict) → AnyÔÉÅ

Resolve this promise‚Äôs value from the given mapping. :param mapping: Dictionary containing values to resolve promises from. :type mapping: PromisesResolutionMap

Ritorna:

The resolved value from the mapping.

Tipo di ritorno:

Any

property id: strÔÉÅ

The lookup key for this promise.

Type:

str

class freeports_analysis.consts.SubfundPromise(ID: str)ÔÉÅ

Promise for resolving subfund names in financial data.

freeports_analysis.consts.flatten_promise_map(mapping: dict) → dictÔÉÅ

Flatten a mapping containing Promise objects by resolving all references. Processes a dictionary that may contain Promise objects, resolving each promise by looking up its value in the mapping until all values are concrete (non-Promise). Detects and prevents circular references that would cause infinite resolution loops. :param mapping: Dictionary containing both direct values and Promise objects to be resolved. :type mapping: PromisesResolutionMap

Ritorna:

A new dictionary with all Promise objects resolved to their final values.

Tipo di ritorno:

PromisesResolutionMap

Solleva:

CircularPromisesChain ‚Äì If a circular reference is detected in the promise resolution chain.
